channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Antiques Roadshow
channel.desc: Fiona and the team are at Dyffryn Gardens near Cardiff in south Wales. Will Farmer is thrilled to see a huge collection of Clarice Cliff ceramics, including many rarities picked up for just a few pounds, while Hilary Kay is amused by a toy figure of a fire-breathing mother-in-law that shoots real sparks. Alastair Chandler is intrigued by a 1960s 'Atmos' clock that runs on air, and Lisa Lloyd admires an ornate Welsh harp, getting to hear it played by a musician who is keeping the art alive.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Narrow Road to the Deep North
channel.desc: Dorrigo faces a malpractice probe in 1989, forcing flashbacks to his time as a POW in 1943; he recalls a failed amputation, a cholera outbreak, and Rabbit's death.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Destination X
channel.desc: The players are in at the deep end when they arrive at a German airport, where nothing is as it seems. So while the players are eyeing up the competition, are they missing out on valuable clues that could help them later on in the game?

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Destination X
channel.desc: The mystery tour reaches new heights, and tensions are high, as the passengers look for clues to the location of Destination X.
